alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Northwest Carter; Southeast Carter; Sullivan; Unicoi; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:33PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sullivan, northeastern Washington, northeastern Unicoi, west central Johnson and central Carter Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 533 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Central, or near Johnson City, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Elizabethton, Central, Hampton, Pine Crest, Midway, Unicoi and Bluff City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Johnson; Northwest Carter; Southeast Carter; Sullivan; Unicoi; Washington
